feature.label: Treaty Clock Example
feature.description: This plugin adds a desktop clock view to Eclipse that has a date (and time) format extension point. Date formats are provided by other plugins either by implementing a DateFormatter interface or by providing an XML format string. The contract contains several conditions, including (Java and XML) interface conditions as well as semantic and quality of service conditions expressed with JUnit test cases.
